name: FIND AND REPLACE: EXCERPTS FROM CWL 325 FORMS OF SCIENCE WRITING (FALL 2021)
name_original: FIND AND REPLACE: EXCERPTS FROM CWL 325 FORMS OF SCIENCE WRITING (FALL 2021)
description: Travel through a semester of weekly Creative Writing Responses and Questions to the Author at Stony Brook University, using similar words to link excerpts, with dynamic and symbolic transitions to evoke colorful sensations and emotions!
